channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Border app that became ‘a salvation’ for migrants to legally enter the US may end
item.description: The CBP One app has brought nearly 1 million people to the U.S. on two-year permits with eligibility to work since January 2023, but it could end under President-elect Donald Trump.

item.title: Driver in Texas migrant smuggling run that led to the deaths of 53 people pleads guilty
Trump wants to cut taxes. So do governors and lawmakers in some states
